data.message: I'm all of a sudden having a flood of friend requests...will you investigate to see if this is some kind of potential hacking attempt etc? Others say it is happening to them as well, from what I hear....Thanx...

replies.message: Hi Ron. If you think your account was taken over by someone else, please secure it by following these tips: http://on.fb.me/1mTKjdc. -Nancy
I'm not saying that....I'm just wondering why so many are all of a sudden sending me friend requests........

I and many others think the requests are being sent by someone within Facebook or someone affiliated or maybe even in your system somehow...could that be?...You may need to check into all of this.....

Seems like all my notifications are nor showing up in the list......something seems wrong..... noticed several likes etc. on my page but all are not in my notification lists......and the other thing about so many friend requests being sent to me all of a sudden for the past few days....odd...
